example.name: Kateryna Hilcher
example.comment: Really helps to plan the day and visualize tasks. Exactly what I was looking for. Huge thanks to the developers!

example.name: Mykola Kapytaniuk
example.comment: Very cool app, everything is clear and functional. A great program for time chronology.

example.name: Ihor Dronenko
example.comment: Really helps to increase productivity. The application has a clear interface and useful features. I like it at the initial stage.

example.name: Volodymyr Shvets
example.comment: A good, visual time planning program.
